msg.msgText:
A "RemoteLogServer" composite object can be created by using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command. The "RemoteLogServer" composite object defines the settings that are used for forwarding MessageSight log messages to a remote syslog server.
SYNTAX: imaserver create RemoteLogServer help imaserver create RemoteLogServer "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create RemoteLogServer "Driver=syslog-tcp" "Host=192.168.56.1" "Port=514"
Configuration items for the "RemoteLogServer" object: Driver The type of the destination for forwarded syslog messages. Options:syslog-tcp, syslog-udp. Host The host name or IP address of the remote syslog server. Port The port number to use when connecting to the remote syslog server. Enabled Whether message forwarding is enabled. Options:True,False. Default:True.
